Day of Sun and Feb. 16 in 2007 to Be Commemorated in Austria
articles.content:
Day of Sun and Feb. 16 in 2007 to Be Commemorated in Austria 
   Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The Austrian preparatory committee was formed in Vienna on Dec. 12 to commemorate the Day of the Sun and February 16 in 2007.
 Adolf Pilz, chairman of the Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and the DPRK, was elected chairman of the committee.    
 The committee decided to hold various functions including round-table talks, film shows and photo exhibitions, issue bulletins and give wide publicity to the Korean people in their efforts to build a great prosperous powerful nation and achieve the peaceful reunification of Korea on the above-said occasions.

Yang Hyong Sop Meets Indonesian Ambassador
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Indonesian Ambassador
   Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, had a talk with Daulat Hotma Audison Passaribu, new Indonesian ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday when the latter paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: Wreath Laid before Bust of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Wreath Laid before Bust of Kim Jong Suk
   Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Ladies from embassies of different countries and missions of international organizations in the DPRK laid a wreath before the bust of Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese war hero, at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on Tuesday to mark the 89th anniversary of her birth. 
 Written on the ribbon of the wreath were letters reading "The revolutionary exploits of anti-Japanese war hero Comrade Kim Jong Suk are immortal!"

articles.title: Film Show for Foreign Women Held
articles.content:
Film Show for Foreign Women Held
   Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- A film show for women at embassies of different countries and missions of international organizations here was held at the Taedonggang Club for the Diplomatic Corps on Tuesday to commemorate the 89th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
 Present there were Pak Sun Hui, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union, and officials concerned.    
 The participants in the show watched Korean feature film "The Loving Care That Brought about Bright Future."

articles.title: Foreign Delegations Arrive Here
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations Arrive Here
   Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the State Great Hural of Mongolia headed by R. Badamdamdin, chairman of the Mongolia-Korea Friendship Parliamentary Group, arrived here today by air. 
 Also arriving was a delegation of the Putong Zhiyuan Trading Co., Ltd, in Beijing of China headed by its General Manager Zhou Haiqiao.
